New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists
Key Match Events: The Nuggets scored a huge third quarter, outscoring the Hawks 31-14
Jamal Murray made clutch free throws to seal the win
Nikola Jokic led the offense effectively
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets expressed pride in their effort and the victory
The coach highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets had seven players in double figures
